headline: Ask HN: Alternatives to DuckDuckGo?
description:
In light of recent news, DuckDuckGo CEO Gabriel Weinberg suggests the search engine will now filter results based on recent political events [1]. For those considering or aware of alternatives, what are they?

For me, DuckDuckGo was supposed to represent private (not selling user data), unbiased (i.e. apolitical), fast search results. Ideally a replacement would meet as many of these goals as possible. Some alternatives I'm aware of:

* Searx - https://searx.github.io/searx/

* Brave search - https://search.brave.com/

Note this is not a discussion about the morality of DuckDuckGo's recent actions.

[1] https://news.yahoo.com/duck-duck-go-reverses-course-will-demote-russian-propaganda-in-search-results-014336389.html
description_zh-Hans:
鉴于最近的新闻，DuckDuckGo首席执行官Gabriel Weinberg建议该搜索引擎现在将根据最近的政治事件来过滤结果[1]。对于那些正在考虑或知道的替代品，它们是什么？

对我来说，DuckDuckGo应该是代表私人（不出售用户数据）、无偏见（即非政治性）、快速的搜索结果。理想的情况是，替代品能够尽可能多地满足这些目标。我所知道的一些替代品：

* Searx - https://searx.github.io/searx/

* Brave search - https://search.brave.com/

注意这不是对DuckDuckGo最近行为的道德性的讨论。

[1] https://news.yahoo.com/duck-duck-go-reverses-course-will-demote-russian-propaganda-in-search-results-014336389.html
description_zh-Hant:
鑑於最近的新聞，DuckDuckGo首席執行官Gabriel Weinberg建議該搜索引擎現在將根據最近的政治事件來過濾結果[1]。對於那些正在考慮或知道的替代品，它們是什麼？

對我來說，DuckDuckGo應該是代表私人（不出售用戶數據）、無偏見（即非政治性）、快速的搜索結果。理想的情況是，替代品能夠儘可能多地滿足這些目標。我所知道的一些替代品：

* Searx - https://searx.github.io/searx/

* Brave search - https://search.brave.com/

注意這不是對DuckDuckGo最近行為的道德性的討論。

[1] https://news.yahoo.com/duck-duck-go-reverses-course-will-demote-russian-propaganda-in-search-results-014336389.html
